graphs.title: All Questions and Answers
graphs.query: source='scalyr' action='addPurpleInputOutputMessage' | let output=( !isempty(outputContent.message) ? outputContent.message : outputContent.powerQuery.query ) | columns timestamp, analyst=inputContent.userDetails.emailAddress, input=inputContent.userInput, output | sort +timestamp

graphs.title: Query Timeline by Status
graphs.query: source='scalyr' action='addPurpleInputOutputMessage' | group count=count() by timestamp=timebucket('1 hour'), status | transpose status on timestamp
